# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
Created on Thu Oct 06 17:58:48 2016
Fragmenter Utilities
@author: Dr. Ivan Laponogov
"""


[docs]def parse_string_fragments(s):
    s=s.split(',');
    return [float(i) for i in s];

    

[docs]def parse_string_fragment_charges(s):
    lst=[];
    inbracket=0;
    ss='';
    for i in s:
        if i=='[':
            inbracket=1;
            ss='';
        elif i==']':
            inbracket=0;
            lst.append([float(i) for i in ss.split(',')]);
            ss='';
        elif inbracket==1:
            ss+=i;
    return lst;

    
    
    
if __name__=='__main__':
    print(parse_string_fragments('972.547938023,972.547938023,972.524128574,971.540112991'))
    print(parse_string_fragment_charges('[0],[0,-4],[-4,0],[-5],[-5],[-5],[0,-7,-6,-1,-2,-3,-4,-5]'))
